verbose_text: When stimuli are presented at the attended location, multisensory (AV) stimuli elicit larger ERP waveforms (N1, P2) than the sum of the visual and auditory (A + V) parts alone, whereas at the unattended location, the difference between the AV and A + V is smaller.
evidence: AV) stimuli elicit larger ERP waveforms (N1, P2
